content: It's important to do things fast. You learn more per unit time because you make contact with reality more frequently. Going fast makes you focus on what's important; there's no time for bullshit. "Slow is fake". A week is 2% of the year. Time is the denominator
Enthusiasm matters! It's much easier to work on things that are exciting to you. It might be easier to do big things than small things for this reason. Energy is a necessary input for progress
As human beings it is our right (maybe our moral duty) to reshape the universe to our preferences: Technology
_3: enables this; You should probably work on raising the ceiling

content: 野心很脆弱，容易被各种困难摧毁
